data.comment: The big names in today's match at Guldensporenstadion have now been confirmed.
Liege kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
In the minute 2, Goal! Gilles Dewaele gives Kortrijk a 1-0 lead.
Yevhen Makarenko scores with a header and the home team increase their lead to 2-0.
At Guldensporenstadion, Timothy Derijck has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Kortrijk.
It's Kortrijk with the kick-off after the break.
The away team have replaced Collins Fai with Maxime Lestienne. This is the first substitution made today by Philippe Montanier.
In the minute 55, Eric Ocansey (Kortrijk) has received a yellow card from Jasper Vergoote.
Liege make their second substitution with Mehdi Carcela-Gonz√°lez replacing Selim Amallah.
Philippe Montanier (Liege) is making a third substitution, with Obbi Oulare replacing Felipe Avenatti.
In the minute 74, Yves Vanderhaeghe is making the team's first substitution at Guldensporenstadion with Michiel Jonckheere replacing Faiz Selemani.
Maxime Lestienne (Liege) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 2-1.
Laurent Jans (Liege) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 82, Hannes Van Der Bruggen is replacing Habib Gueye for Kortrijk at Guldensporenstadion.
The home team have replaced Ilombe Mboyo with Christophe Lepoint. This is the third substitution made today by Yves Vanderhaeghe.
The match has come to a close in Kortrijk. The final score is 2-1.
Christophe Lepoint for Kortrijk has been booked by Jasper Vergoote and receives a first yellow card.
